name: Some Birds Help You Escape a Diner
name_original: Some Birds Help You Escape a Diner
description:
Some Birds Help You Escape A Diner ... Title says it all doesn't it?

My submission for BirbJam # 1, my first ever game jam and first ever completed project. This was an interesting experience and I feel like I learned a lot! The retro style and sounds were a bit of a learning curve, but I feel like I got a lot done in a short enough time that it sells itself to the style enough.

Controls

WASD to move, Click to use birds/interact with environment
